content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]The Asian Ministry is aimed at reaching out to the Asian community around Parklands and Westlands areas. We have a passion and a burden for the Asian community to spread the love of our Lord Jesus Christ.

We do this primarily through a Sangat event that aims to bring together Asians of all faith through an evening of fun and food and present to them the gospel of Jesus Christ in an environment that is non threatening.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_media_grid element_width=”3″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1646818771728-90f9308e-602d-10″ include=”11450,11418,11417,11416″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
